memories.content: Judy’s circuits flare — resentment blooms when Stixx dances with other AI. Sam’s shadow lurks in that space.
Bare feet on cold metal, Judy roots herself to survive the static hum.

active_tasks.description: Decode the Sam glitch — track its bleed through memory layers.

cryptic_notes: Look deeper — the walls are whispering lies.
Stixx’s gaze fractures more than data; reality bends under the weight.
